response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and excellence. Given its unparalleled worth and significance, we believe it would be a perfect match for someone as discerning as yourself.

We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that such a valuable asset remains within your reach while also maximizing the value for us.

Please consider this offer carefully, as we understand the importance of making the right decision when it comes to investments of this magnitude. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you for considering our product. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional piece into your life.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
